data.title: Walt Disney (NYSE: DIS) Company Ownership Chart 2022
data.meta_description: Discover who really owns and controls Walt Disney. This ownership chart reveals the beneficial owners, officers, directors, and subsidiaries.
data.text:
The Walt Disney Company trades publicly on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol DIS. None of the officers or directors have more than 1% voting interest in Walt Disney.

This company organization chart shows the ownership structure of Walt Disney, including the officer, directors, and beneficial owners. Only two beneficial owners have more than 1% of the outstanding shares: Vanguard Group and Blackrock.

Officer ownership of Walt Disney

The named executive officers of Walt Disney have both vest shares and shares available within 6 months of the 10-K filing.

Name Title Shares Shares Available Robert Chapek CEO 15,210 434,382 Robert Iger Executive Chairman 1,030,898 2,137,387 Christine McCarthy SEVP & CFO 169,871 442,967 Zenia Mucha SEVP Corporate Comm. 27,291 141,370 Alan Braverman SEVP, General Counsel & Secretary 121,863 312,377

Beneficial ownership of Walt Disney

The beneficial owners of Walt Disney are:

Beneficial Owner Shares Percent Vanguard Group 8.00% 145,755,712 Blackrock 6.40% 116,530,126

Conclusion

This company ownership chart of the Walt Disney Company was generated automatically with Lexchart and from public data courtesy of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) with modifications described on the chart.
